```{=html}
<div id="rh-gate-overlay" style="position:fixed;inset:0;background:rgba(0,0,0,.82);z-index:99999;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:1rem;">
<div style="width:min(520px,95vw);background:#111827;color:#f9fafb;border:1px solid #374151;border-radius:14px;padding:1rem 1rem 1.1rem 1rem;box-shadow:0 12px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.45);font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;">
<h2 style="margin:0 0 .4rem 0;font-size:1.2rem;">Private Access</h2>
<p style="margin:0 0 .75rem 0;line-height:1.4;color:#d1d5db;">Enter password to view this page.</p>

<label for="rh-gate-password" style="display:block;margin:.25rem 0 .35rem 0;font-size:.9rem;color:#d1d5db;">Password</label>
<input id="rh-gate-password" type="password" autocomplete="current-password" style="width:100%;padding:.7rem .75rem;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #4b5563;background:#0b1220;color:#fff;outline:none;" />

<div style="display:flex;gap:.6rem;align-items:center;margin-top:.75rem;">
<button id="rh-gate-submit" type="button" style="padding:.65rem .9rem;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #4b5563;background:#2563eb;color:white;cursor:pointer;">Unlock</button>
<span id="rh-gate-msg" style="font-size:.9rem;color:#fca5a5;"></span>
</div>

<p style="margin:.8rem 0 0 0;font-size:.78rem;color:#9ca3af;"> </p>
</div>
</div>

<script>
(function () {
  var GATE_PASSWORD = "vision_2026";
  var STORAGE_KEY = "researchhub_gate_ok_v2";

  var overlay = document.getElementById("rh-gate-overlay");
  var input = document.getElementById("rh-gate-password");
  var btn = document.getElementById("rh-gate-submit");
  var msg = document.getElementById("rh-gate-msg");

  function unlock() {
    try { localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, "1"); } catch (e) {}
    if (overlay) overlay.remove();
    document.documentElement.style.overflow = "";
    document.body.style.overflow = "";
  }

  function deny() {
    if (msg) msg.textContent = "Wrong password";
    if (input) {
      input.value = "";
      input.focus();
    }
  }

  function checkStored() {
    try {
      return localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) === "1";
    } catch (e) {
      return false;
    }
  }

  if (checkStored()) {
    unlock();
    return;
  }

  document.documentElement.style.overflow = "hidden";
  document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";

  if (input) {
    setTimeout(function () { input.focus(); }, 50);
    input.addEventListener("keydown", function (e) {
      if (e.key === "Enter") {
        e.preventDefault();
        if (input.value === GATE_PASSWORD) {
          unlock();
        } else {
          deny();
        }
      }
    });
  }

  if (btn) {
    btn.addEventListener("click", function () {
      if (input && input.value === GATE_PASSWORD) {
        unlock();
      } else {
        deny();
      }
    });
  }
})();
</script>
